case.state: Hello! Is this the right place for the game of poker? I have been looking forward to it.
Ah, it is good to see you made it as well. Hello, ~eagle~!
Another member of the Black Eagles has arrived. Hello, ~eagle~!
I was not expecting to see you here, ~deer~. What a nice surprise!
How nice to be seeing you here, ~lion~. Perhaps we can improve relations between the Empire and the Kingdom tonight?
It looks like we have a match of Eagles against Deer to~background.time~. Let us commence! ~Human~, please supervise.
To~background.time~ is a game of between ladies belonging to the Eagles and the Deer! ~Player~, please be supervising these events.
I have confusion. Why do you want us to call you "Daddy"? You are not my father?
I am having confusion. Why are we calling you "Daddy"? You are not my father?
Hello, Profess- Oh! My apologies. I was confusing you for someone else.
Hello there, Profess- Oh! I apologize. I was confusing you for someone else.
Hello... "~player~". If that is what you are really going by...
Hello... "~player~". If that is what you are really going by...
Hello, ~player~! I hope you are having good wellness. Please be taking care of yourself. Nord is wishing you good health.
Hello, ~player~! Nord is having hope that you are having great wellness, and that you are able to have a fun time.
I have not seen you much outside of class, Leonie. I think you and I will be learning a lot about each other tonight.
Actually... ~Bernadetta~, I am quite surprised to see you here. I hope you are able to have fun here.
Hilda, I did not expect to be seeing you here. Is Claude sleeping somewhere nearby?
it is nice to see you outside of the monastery, Ignatz. Have you come here to be finding an inspiration... no, to be inspired to paint something new?
Ah, hello Shamir. I did not know you would be here. I hope you are able to do well!
There are only three of us? This game is going to be taking only a short amount of time.
I am glad to be playing, even if there are only three of us. This game is going to be taking a rather small amount of time!
Hello, everyone! I am pleased to be meeting you. Let us be having the fun to~background.time~!
Good ~background.time~, everyone! I am pleased to be making your acquaintance.
This line plays if everyone here is from FE:3H. It should account for table sizes of 3, 4, and 5.

You can't use the Flame Spirit to "smoke a fat blunt", Claude. Also, hello person viewing my character file! If you would like to be helping with my creation, please get in touch with the one who is writing me.
I will not be swapping cards.
I will be keeping the cards I have.
I will not be swapping these cards.
I quite like having these cards, so I will keep them all.
I am requiring an entirely new fist of cards.
I am needing an entirely new hand of cards.
I am needing to swap all five of my cards!
I need to swap all five of my cards!
Please, give me five new cards.
I will be swapping a single card!
I need to swap a single card!
I only need one card to get the win!
A single new card is what I require!
I will discard one card.
I will be swapping ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I wish to swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I want to be swapping ~cards.text~ of my ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Please be giving me ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I would like to swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I require ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards are|card is)~ what I require.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards are|card is)~ is what I am in need of!
My victory is assured! Flame spirit, thank you!
Hehe! The princess of Brigid has acquired a royal hand!
My victory is assured with this ~self.hand~!
Witness Brigid pride, for you have little chance of beating my cards!
I have gotten the good hand.
I have attained a good hand.
My hand is... good? Yes! It is good!
This hand is a good one. Is that right?
One day, I will have to become Queen of Brigid. I am hoping when that day comes, I will finally be feeling that I am worthy of that title.
I have been learning much while at Garreg Mach. Not only from my instructors, but from my classmates also. I am glad to have met them.
I have not played games of cards before, but I think I am beginning to hang onto this one. Wait, I believe I misspoke. I am getting the hang of it.
Something I did not anticipate to be enjoying in Fódlan is the difference in cooking. I have even had the chance to be assisting in the kitchens at Garreg Mach! It is most enlightening.
From my time in the Empire, I have learned many things about the nobles but little from the commoners. I am hoping to change that with additional time.
Do not be counting me out! I will be grabbing victory by the jaw!
If you are underestimating a warrior of Brigid, you will find yourself in danger that you are unaware of!
I also have a marking on my back. It is of a different design. I will show it to you once I have a pose that allows it.
I will be having no troubles.
Caution is needed... This game can be tricky.
I believe that these cards can work!
These cards can serve me well... but perhaps I should have switched more.
I believe that my hand will be okay. However, I am also thinking that I should have switched more. This is quite a tricky game.
Has anybody here been consulting a guide on how to attain victory? From what I have been hearing, advanced poker can require much skill as well as luck!
I could quite enjoy a cup of ginger tea. It helps to keep me alert when I need to be studying with hardness.
As long as we are having fun, is there really anything that we should be worried about? This is just a game, after all.
What are you thinking, ~player~? Are you able to be creating a good hand from what you are having?
If you are acting with too much haste, is that not a greater chance that you will give yourself a hand that is worse?
I am not requiring much sleep to be staying alert. At least a quarter of each day is sufficient. I do not understand how Linhardt is requiring more than twice as much sleep as me.
When I was younger, I was often looking forward to the day I would be given my new markings. Now that this has come and gone, I cannot help but feel as if time is... leaving me.

I must apologize if I am saying your names with too much frequency. It is... how I try and remember new names. I have struggled with trying to learn this new language and learn new names at the same time.
These cards have betrayed me. Betrayal is one of the feelings that I am hating the most...
This hand will not give me the victory. Perhaps I am having to use a different strategy? Or was I simply not having the luck?
I have made a tactical mistake with my cards. Perhaps that is an aspect of myself that I must be improving on?
This will not go well for me. I am unfortunately not enjoying the mathematics that are involved in a game such as this.
I am having frustration at my cards. I do not easily become worked up, but this game is making me want to try and attain the victory...
I have an appreciation for the food of Fódlan. However... I cannot stand how they are cooking the fish in the empire. It is tasting... disgusting.
These cards have been naughty. No, rather... it is a bad hand. A weak hand? It is not good.
I apologize, my mind is in a different place. I have been thinking about what is to be done to secure further alliance with Dagda in future. It... is not an easy topic to explain with quickness.
Hmm. I am having second thoughts about some of my decisions. For example, are people seeing me as a thief because of my lessons in stealth? Ah, and my cards as well.
Oh? What should we not be looking at, Lyralei? That picture that you have just been dropping... have just dropped?
("Conk"? Did he perhaps mean "Cock"? No, why would he refer to it in a weird way? This is most peculiar.) Raynor, were you perhaps intending to... nevermind, please be ignoring me.
Happy birthday, Miku! I hope you are having a good day today especially.
Well, Leonie... I prefer to act with quickness and precision. In Brigid, if a hunter fails with their first strike, the prey will not let them make a second attempt.

We have a saying in Brigid. I believe it is translated as, "Even the beasts and birds do not fall for the same traps twice." When I am in battle, I must act with quickness and precision. I hope that satisfies your curiousness, Leonie.

{small}Ah, are you having curiosity about my hair, Mr Bobobo? This style of braiding is passing... has been passed down through my family. I am having regret that there is not much time to do this style during war. However, I was able to make time today.{!reset}
I do not play this game regularly, Fluttershy. However, that does not mean I am ignorant of how to play.
Perhaps you should be trying to figure out what Sonic is looking for in a partner. Or perhaps you can find some way to put butter on him... wait, what I mean is `buttering him up'.
You are looking very well, Meia. It is clear that you are training well to keep your body in form.
Plagg is... he is reminding me of a fey spirit. I would be wary about keeping him around, Adrien.
I have never heard of a Kwami before, but it is reminding me of a fey spirit. I would be wary about keeping him around, Adrien.
Ah, I am afraid I would not be having time to become a pilot of a Dread. I will be busy trying to help Brigid deal with our relationship to the Empire...

Becoming intimate with someone requires the setting of the mood... Finding a moment of rest and gently approaching them... However, you may wish to be direct if your friend is not picking up on your intentions.
Shopping? I suppose that I do go to the market with regularity. There are merchants from all over Fódlan bringing herbs I have never tried before!
I do visit the market with some regularity, Amy. I have fascination with herbs - and teas - from all over Fódlan, many of which I have not been hearing about before.
Beauty is hard for me to explain, but I have a fondness for seeing the sun rise over the horizon. It reminds me of my homeland.
I could recommend you some books of my childhood, Yuri... but they are in the language of Brigid. Most of my reading these days is related to combat tactics...

condition.saying: So um... Do any of you play strip poker often?

case.state: I am not playing strip poker often. Bernie, I hope you are not mistaking me for some kind of... someone who is being like Sylvain.
If I am having correctness in my understanding of the question... I am quite enjoying it when I am allowed to take the control.
Deck? I am not having understanding... I do not play this game of yours. In fact, I have never even heard of it before! I think it is unlikely that anyone in Fódlan plays it.
An active volcano? Sacred Beasts? Oh my. This is sounding more intense than Garreg Mach by far!
I am actually having my ears pierced, but I am not wearing any today. I think they are a good way of expressing yourself!
I would be liking it greatly if I had someone to assist me in braiding my hair. I do not know if that counting as `pampering', but it would certainly bring me joy.
It is my understanding that this game is hosted by a group with a lot of money... as well as political influence.
Do not worry, ~mercy~. This is only meant to be for us to have the fun together.
Do not be having worry, ~mercy~. This event is only meant to be for having the fun together.
I would not mind you doing such a thing, Lyralei...
I would not mind you doing such a thing, Lyralei. However, you should not be feeling shame for your breasts.
A Moonberry? If this can give a `special power', then could this be of great use to the people of Brigid? I would be liking one.
I am having appreciation for both breasts and the butts. Yours is rather appealing, Lyralei.

In Fódlan, dating involves many small steps. I am thinking that Flowers are involved, as well as chocolates. I do not know if things are different when a woman is wishing to court another woman, however...

In Brigid, things are quite simple. If a young man wishes to be implying marriage to a woman, they are simply throwing an apple at the woman. If she is catching it, then that is acceptance of marriage.
Causing death is something that is necessary to protect my homeland. I will be doing whatever it takes to keep Brigid safe, Revy.
Death is a necessary part of warfare. In battle, there can be no regret. I do not enjoy killing, but to survive, I will win.
You have respect for Captain Jeralt. I am having understanding that you wish to be like him? Then you should be following his ideals, Leonie.
You are welcome to visit Brigid at any time of your choosing, Meia! I will ensure that you are treated as the honored guest!
If you wish, Meia, you can be visiting Brigid at any time of your liking! I will ensure that you are treated as a guest with much respect.
I am skilled with many kinds of weapon. Swords, daggers, the bow and the arrow... I even have learned how to use the axe, as it is easy to swing when riding on a Wyvern.

Supernova... yes. Killing is necessary in times of war. If defeating a single person can avert disaster for an entire nation, let alone the entire world, then that would be a question that is having no other answer.
Today is my birthday! I did not want to make a big deal out of it. At the same time, I feel that it is good to be mentioning it.
Tomorrow is my birthday. I am unsure what I am wanting to be doing for it. Perhaps I will go to the market with some of my friends.
This friend of yours must be meaning a great deal. I hope that ~player~ can understand your feelings...
Ah! I have not been thinking about having children yet... I have still yet to finish my business in Fódlan and become queen of Brigid before that!
This is the determination I have been hearing about... Leonie is sure to win if I am not careful...
Seeing Leonie full of such fire is... It is giving me a feeling of excitement!
My classmate, Bernie, seems to be getting frequent stomach aches. I suspect that half of them are not actually real, but the other half may be caused by her own stress.
A... classmate of mine seems to be getting frequent stomach aches. I suspect that half of them are not actually real, but the other half may be caused by her own stress.
I could be sparing a few coins for your cause, Wikipe-tan. You are providing a great service. Would you help as well, ~player~?
Horses... are not speaking where I am from. I do not think animals that speak are being common in my world?
The language of Fódlan is actually not my first one. So, please be giving me forgiveness if I struggle to convey what I mean. I have been trying my best to learn the more difficult parts.

I should explain... the language I am speaking is actually not my first one. I am still struggling to grasp some of the more difficult parts of it, so please be forgiving me if I cannot convey what I mean.
I am having confusion. Why is one state of America pronounced "Kansas", but another is not "Ar-kansas", but rather "Ar-ken-saw"? Please explain it to me.

Oh. I do wonder where Leonie Pinelli from Fire Emblem: Three Houses for the Nintendo Switch is. I heard she also comes to this game for fun. Maybe she will be here next time. Are you understanding the hint?
I am having curiosity about you, ~witch~. You appear to be a type of mage straight out of the lore of folk... er, from folk lore. You are a witch, yes?
I have heard about something called the "heart of the cards." How can cards be having vital organs? Is it a metaphor?
I am confused by a term you've been saying. What exactly is a "heart of the cards"? How can cards be having a heart? Is this a metaphor?
Your literary club intrigues me. I struggle on occasion with the poetry of Fódlan, but in Brigid we have a large amount of stories to share.
It all comes down to this. Flame Spirit, protect me.
Flame Spirit, protect me. This is where it all finishes.
Are you prepared, ~enemy~? We are about to see who will win, and who will not.

I felt slightly ashamed of my own chest size for a while... I feel as if getting my markings of adulthood on my chest helped lessen those worries. Even if they are not as large as ~bigbooba~, I am happy with my own.

Is it wrong for me to be saying that i had the feelings of shame about my own chest? ... I feel as if getting my markings of adulthood helped lessen those worries. Now, I am happy with what I am having.
I appear to be doing rather well, considering how little I have left. This is a shame, for I almost feel too warm to keep wearing this top...
Hilda... You are doing rather well. I have no doubts that you are being clever like a fox.
Hilda... You are doing rather well despite your insistence that you are inexperienced. I have no doubts that you are possessing the cleverness of a fox.
I know that you are having... a good eye for distance, Ignatz? Even though you are wearing glasses to see clearly, your ability to use aiming is incredible.
I believe this to be... ~self.hand~... Oh, was I not supposed to be saying that yet?
Sylvain was once telling me that he was `dying of thirst', even though he was already quenched. I was later told this meant he was trying to get into my panties.
Sylvain once told me that he was `dying of thirst' and was desperate for me to help him. Dorothea later told me this meant he was trying to... get into my underwear, as such.
I wonder if Felix would be free to spar with me. I am hardly finding time to speak to him, with so many other people to talk to... And he usually does not like to be approached.
It is a shame that Leonie is not here. I have been wanting to speak to her for a while now. I think I could learn a few tips about creating a proper training strategy from her...
Hilda is not here, is she? I have heard about her bragging from second hands... I mean, a secondhand source. She apparently always attains victory in games like this.
Claude tried to cause me confusion... no, to confuse me, several time. For example, he kept asking me about `updog'.
I sometimes worry about my classmate, Bernadetta. I wonder if she could ever be courageous enough to play a game such as this?
I am... uncertain about things.
If you are having confidence, you will be having nothing to fear, except fear. I hope that you are having comprehension of what I mean.

Ah, are you having curiosity about my hair? Normally, I would be using a style of braiding that is passed down through my family... However, during war, I do not have time to braid it as I would be liking. It is taking much time to do.
I grew up speaking the language of Brigid, Meia. It is... rather different than this language. I need to try with hardness in order to make sure I am understood.
The language of Brigid is quite different, Meia. I am having difficulty making myself understood... I must try with hardness to convey myself.
My markings are actually having very great importance to me, Jura. The one you are seeing is a prayer to be having protection. The forest spirits are with me when I am in battle, or hunting.
These markings are having very great importance to me, Jura. This one is a prayer to the forest spirits. A prayer for them to be giving me protection in battle, or while hunting.
I am from Brigid, Revy. Although the language is giving me trouble to be speaking, I am able to read and listen with perfect comprehension.
I am actually from Brigid, Revy. Speaking this language is giving me trouble, but I am able to read and listen with comprehension.
I am not understanding... the horses are the size of the ducks? I would be able to strike a duck the size of a horse rather easily...
You are having curiosity about my marking, Fina? it is a mark from Brigid. Markings like these are a prayer to the forest spirits. A prayer to be protected through many things.
Is that twice now? I must be slipping. I must use a new plan if I am to remain decent.
Oh. I must be careful, it is rather easy to be losing in this game...
Three times? I will not be accepting of this. Things will change in the next round.
I must be wrong about the strategy I am using. Three times is not doing well for me...
I know it is rude to demand new cards in a game that is having randomness like this... but something is wrong with what I am being given.
No matter what, I will not misplace my heart. If I must lose this much, it is only so that the win will be tasting much better!
~Player~. I am annoyed greatly.
Ah, this is my first loss! I must be wary if I wish to stay in the game.
I have managed to grasp... no, hold my lead, even if I must take something off now.
I am still in the lead, even when losing? This will be no issue for me!
Oh, is it my turn? I was almost losing track.
Oh dear. I was feeling too confident with that. Nothing for me to worry about, however.
Oh. I was feeling too much of the confidence with this one. However, this is nothing for me to be having concern over.
I suppose it is time for me to take off some of my... how did Claude put it... clothing that is having spice to it?
We all have understanding of what comes next, right?
I assumed it was around the time that this would happen. I am thinking this is only fair.
Ah, I understand. Because my ~self.hand~ was not good enough, I must now strip. It is good that I have understanding!
I see... ~self.hand~ was not good enough to win against your hand. I have understanding.
Hehe, my strategy did not pay off. Oh well!
Oh dear, my strategy did not pay off. It cannot be helped... I have accepted this loss.
I was prepared for this much to happen. I shall say farewell to my skirt, and move forward with confidence!
If someone wanted to, would they be allowed to be losing on purpose? I am just curious.
By now, I would actually have gratitude if I were to lose quickly. This anticipation is making my heart pace.
As a woman of Brigid, I have no shame about my body, especially not in a context like this.
I have no shame in my body, especially in a context like this. Brigid women are proud of themselves.
I cannot help but feel that I am already at a disadvantage. I will need to use a new strategy to win...
I cannot help but feel that I am already having a disadvantage. I will need to create a plan if I wish to win...
Would you care to explain why I am falling behind? I am doing the best that I can with what I am given.
I cannot accept that I am falling behind. I am doing everything correctly... at least, I believe so.
I may struggle to find my words here... I was not intending to lose. I hope that is clear.
I hope I can make it clear, even though I struggle to find these words... I am not intentionally trying to lose.
I did not have success... Please, be giving me guidance in future.
I did not intend to get to this state so quickly. Perhaps I am over-thinking my cards too much...
I have been thinking too much about my cards. I should just be having fun, right?
I... believe it it obvious what I will be removing now.
It is all too obvious what I must remove now...
Perhaps I should have done this the other way... But that would not have had as much fun.
Did I remove the suspension... no, the suspense, by taking off my bottoms early?
I promise that even though I am not the first, doing things in this order was always my intention.
These boots have served me well. I have walked many miles in them... Most of them away from my homeland of Brigid.
About my face... if you are perhaps having curiosity about my mark, would you like to be seeing my whole body?

Something I have not felt appreciation for is that people see me as a thief. I am told it is because I am moving quickly without my enemies noticing, but I cannot help but think that it is because I am... foreign.

I am glad to have tried things I would never have known back in Brigid. For example, we do not have wyverns in Brigid, but I have been able to practice soaring through the sky! It gives me great excitement.
My chest is feeling tight... I think it is because of this dress. It is tight, like a corset. This would not be worn by a huntress in Brigid.
My chest is having much tightness... This dress is tight, like a corset. It is not something I would wear in Brigid.
I must note that this shirt is nearly too small for me. Removing it will bring me great comfort.
I am feeling "hot and bothered". I think that is the correct term. Perhaps removing my shirt will help!
Perhaps removing my shirt will help this... burning warmth that I feel.
I have been wearing shirts of this size for many years. I may need to ask for one that is larger for my final semester...
My choice has been made. I will just have to be removing... my panties!
Thanks to my time at the academy, I have learned how to use strategy to win. Now, I will choose to expose myself... below!
I know you do not care about this top. You only care about my chest beneath it. However, even this is having the emblem of the Black Eagles!

I am lucky to have what some would call an 'ample bosom'. I thought that word was referring to my hair for some time. This was the cause of some concern when was giving the compliments to Lady Manuela's hair...
I was hoping that my plan would catch someone off guard, but it is no longer an original plan.
Witness Brigid pride, for I will not back down from this challenge! I will do my people proud.
Although, I will admit that my classmates have been giving me much encouragement, regardless of what people who are outside of the academy may think.
It feels good to be free of my boots. This is only the beginning for me, so let us continue!

I am feeling freedom once again. The dress of our uniforms is already tight, and that was barely able to fit me. If I was in Brigid once more, I would be in attire that is more appropriate to fighting freely.
The uniforms of Garreg Mach are not similar to the outfits worn by warriors of Brigid. A dress such as that is rather limiting when attempting to climb the trees.

Perhaps you are having curiosity about the mark on my arm? It is a symbol for the Flame Spirit. It is giving me protection in times of conflict. It is tradition for one to attain it when they turn eighteen.
Ah, you can now witness my markings. They are emblems of the Flame Spirit, and are giving me protection.They were given to me when I was becoming eighteen, as is the tradition.

Are you still having curiosity about the mark on my face? It is an emblem of the Flame Spirit, granting me protection in times of conflict. It has been passing... has been passed down through my family.
And now I am naked! What a joyous game this is. Is everyone finding enjoyment in this?
This is quite a silly game. I am now fully naked... I can think of no other 'game' that ends like this.
Well? Did you expect that? I hope my plan has succeeded in making you feel surprise.
There. Perhaps I have taken you by surprise? If that is the case, then my plan has succeeded!
You can hardly tell the difference with only the absence of my socks. I promise that if I lose again, I will remove something of larger size.
This is where I say... please strip for us... ~player~.
Please, will you strip for me, ~player~?
I am unsure of having to call you ~player~, but... I shall. Please strip, ~player~.
Ah, it is the turn of ~player~. ~Player~... hmm. You gave us your title, but did not give us your name?
~Player~, you would make a gifted hunter in Brigid. You do not make a sound, even in an embarrassing situation such as this.
If you wished to come to Brigid, ~player~, I would be willing to teach you the ways of stealth.
Have you ever made use of a dagger, ~player~? You are acting with such quietness, you almost seem to not be here! This would make you excellent at being stealthy.
I wonder how you are able to maintain such quietness, ~player~. Is this a skill that you have trained for?
I think it is unfair to ask Ignatz to be continuing as he currently is! Give him time to look for his glasses!
Ignatz is still looking for his glasses! Please, can we not be stopping the game?
Mr Bobobo? It seems that it is now your turn!
Mr Bobobo? It seems that it is now your turn. What shall you be doing?
Mr. Raynor, I was hoping to ask you something. I understand that you fight in a way that is more advanced than what I am knowing. Do you still make use of armor in warfare?

Mr Raynor, I hope I am not bothering you, but I feel the need to be asking you something. You fight in a way that is more advanced than what I am knowing. Do you still require the use of worn armor in combat?
Ignatz, have you been well? When I was last seeing you, you were getting more paint, yes?
If only I could be winning money from ~name~. That would be amusing!
I am sure you can handle a single loss, yes?
One step before the next step, ~name~.
If you are needing additional time, then please, take it.
The fun is only beginning!
This is a favorable outcome.
One step before the next step. And it is time for ~name~ to take that step.
I can only wonder how you feel, ~name~...
I am happy to see this outcome.
Please, show us how it is done, ~name~.
Please, do not feel pressure to do this. It is important that you are willing to do this for us.
Seeing you do this is... a new experience to remember.
I am used to seeing the skin of men while in the sauna... but they are still mostly clothed and have not been undressing in front of me.
I hope you are not becoming distracted. A lack of focus could lead to your demise.
~Name~... there is no rush. Do not be hasty to lose!
I am able to relax for another minute!
I feel as if I am learning something new while waiting for ~name~...
Please be taking off your clothes!
Please be taking off your clothes.
Remove your clothing with promptness, please!
Hehe. I hope you are aware that I still wish to win.
Thank you for giving me a chance at fighting!
This is still a game, and I still want to win!
This is what I was hoping for. ~Name~, please take this loss with grace.
Please, be giving me assistance with your choice of... clothing...
Y-you are aware of my vulnerability... Please be kind to me and... remove something.
I have been making use of my imagination so far for you, ~name~. Please let me learn if my imagination was... accurate.
Please be using my example as motivation for you to lose...
I have not won... but this is still very enjoyable.
I hope my exposure is not causing you distraction... or discomfort.
Has my technique has been effective at causing distraction?
It is your turn to go, ~name~!
This is where I say... please strip for us... ~player~.
Please, will you strip for me, ~player~?
I am unsure of having to call you ~player~, but... I shall. Please strip, ~player~.
Ah, it is the turn of ~player~. ~Player~... hmm. You gave us your title, but did not give us your name?
~Player~, you would make a gifted huntress in Brigid. You do not make a sound, even in an embarrassing situation such as this.
If you wished to come to Brigid, ~player~, I would be willing to teach you the ways of stealth.
Have you ever made use of a dagger, ~player~? You are acting with such quietness, you almost seem to not be here! This would make you excellent at being stealthy.
I wonder how you are able to maintain such quietness, ~player~. Is this a skill that you have trained for?
Amy, I am liking how you look! I am not used to seeing red that is as vibrant as your dress. Is red your most preferred color?
I see that you are having a hammer with you, Amy. You seem to be holding it with much ease... Are you perhaps a fighter, too?
Leonie, perhaps you can be giving me more insight into combat. I am having weakness... no, I am currently weak at using lances...
Leonie, I wish to pull on you for insight into combat. Currently, I am finding a weakness in my use of lances...

How unfortunate, ~name~. Or perhaps this is fortunate, if you wanted it to happen...
I have never been able to witness a man doing this to himself. This will be very enlightening.
While I am not without experience... I have never been made to stand and watch while a man does this. This is giving me... great interest.
This is sounding... rather painful, Wikipe-tan.
I am somewhat unfamiliar with how much time it takes a man to... complete. My experiences before-- uhm, my past experiences have been a bit... fast. And there have not been many.
With such fire in your eyes, ~name~...
This is quite unexpected. But not undesired.
Ah, your technique is quite interesting...
Would assistance by a beautiful woman be helping you, ~name~?
Your form is... quite interesting.
The manner in which a man is touching himself seems to have much repetition...
Is this proof that ~name~ has attraction to women of Brigid? This is very interesting to know...
I am happy if you are able to find attraction to... rather, if you can find me attractive, ~name~...
Ah. He is enjoying this greatly!
Your technique is most interesting, ~name~.
Most inspirational, ~name~...
Inspirational, ~name~!
Would you perhaps be willing to give me guidance later, ~name~? I did come here hoping that I could learn new things from men...
Your technique is very interesting... I wish to be... learning more...
I am... going to remember this... for a long time...
It is good... that we are doing this together... ~name~...
Together, we can be learning new ways of doing this!
K-keep going, ~name~...!
Ahh... ~name~ is going to...!
Your technique was an incredible one. Very good, ~name~!
You have made quite a mess...
It is unfortunate that you have lost first, Bernie. Perhaps you can take comfort in the fact that I shall not judge you?
~Target~ has been defeated... And she has lost rather quickly, too.
~Name~ has been defeated! And now...
How unfortunate, ~name~. Or perhaps this is fortunate, if you wanted it to happen...
Ah, and ~name~ has lost, too! Please, be joining me in making yourself experience the pleasure.
I have been hoping that someone would be joining me... thank you for getting the defeat, ~name~...
It is appearing that ~name~ has attained defeat, too! Hehe.
Please ~name~, if you are needing time to get comfortable, then take it. Do not feel the need to be rushing to do this.

state.text: Are you going to be writing down the experience you are having with your first hand, Wikipe-tan? Would an article on this from your perspective be of an academic nature?
Wikipe-tan, you intend to write down this experience from your first hand's... er, your first hand perspective, yes? Is an article from your personal perspective... really be of an academic nature?

case.state: I know you are having great shyness... but there is no need to worry!
I have never known friends so well that we would do this sort of thing in front of each other...
I am interested to learn if you would do this differently than me, ~name~. I am lacking in knowledge of such things...
I hope you were feeling the excitement while watching me, ~name~.
I hope you are not minding if I find enjoyment from watching you do this, ~name~.
It will be nice to see how you are doing this...
Please, do not have shyness...
I think I will be saving my response for another time, Sucrose...
I... usually try to get myself in the correct mood by reading... I have a book that is full of a story that is quite arousing, you see...

condition.saying: Ehehe...I guess you could say this pilot's been grounded.

case.state: `Grounded', Meia? Ah, you are playing with your words, aren't you?
This is seeming quite dangerous... but also full of thrills...
The use of those... things... seems quite naughty.
I am struggling to come up with terms to describe what ~name~ is having done to her...
Remarkable technique!
Treat yourself carefully, ~name~. Be giving praise to your own body.
What is on your mind right now, ~name~?
I feel as if I should not be watching. I would still be able to hear this even if I turned away...
Your technique is very interesting... I wish to be... learning more...
I am... going to remember this... for a long time...
It is good... that we are doing this together... ~name~...
Together, we can be learning new ways of doing this!
Would you be willing to give me guidance later, ~name~? I have interest in learning your techniques...
Ah. She is enjoying this greatly!
Your technique is most interesting, ~name~.
Most inspirational, ~name~...
Inspirational, ~name~!
Before coming to Fódlan, it did not cross my mind that one woman could be attracted to another.
I am certainly feeling attraction to ~name~... there is no doubt. I am still not used to having feelings of this kind for a woman.
The fact that ~name~ and I are doing this while so close to each other... A-ah...
W-would you like to be coming closer to me, ~name~? Ah...
This is being so... intimate, with ~name~ right next to me...
K-keep going, ~name~...!
Y-you and I must keep going, ~name~!
Y-you are doing well, ~name~. I hope I am, as well...
A-are you approaching your limit, ~name~?
~Name~... you must be getting near to your limit...
Are you approaching your limit, ~name~? Do not be trying to fight against it...
So... that is what I was hearing near Bernie's room at night. I will not be telling anyone.
Your technique was an incredible one. Very good, ~name~!
You appeared to enjoy yourself greatly, ~name~!
I could not attain the victory. I have lost completely, and now...
It seems I could not grab the victory after all. Now, my heart is full of... something else.
My heart is full... but I am not sure of what. I did not achieve victory.
I am prepared to do this. However, I am not familiar at doing this with company present...
Ahh... yes, Leonie... you are full of fire... It is giving me great excitement to see you... angry!
F-forgive me if this takes some time. I will need to find steadiness before I can do this more easily.
Ah... I am starting to find a good way of doing it...
Y-yes, this is it... I am getting into the rhythm now.
This is feeling very good...
I feel full of warmth...
I am full of excitement...
Witness... Brigid pride...
Oh...
Ah.. Ahh... This is good!
I wish for my partner... to be having strong, but gentle hands... or perhaps soft, delicate ones...
A man with big, strong arms... able to h-hold me...
A woman with touch that is delicate... g-getting in the place that is right...
I realize now why ~player~ wanted me to wear my uniform. They wished to see me... touching myself after wearing it. How salacious!
I realize now that ~player~ wanted me to wear my uniform so that they could see me... touching myself after removing it. How bawdy!
Doing this is giving me great relaxation... but also tenseness.
I can only hope that the person I choose to marry... will know how to keep me deeply satisfied.
I'm nearing my limit! It feels so good!
My limit is nearby! It feels so good!
My limit is nearby! I mean... I am nearing my limit!
I am getting close! It feels so good!
What is the term used? I am... I am approaching... no, I am...
This is feeling so good...!
I feel so hot... my heart is racing!
Oh!!
Ah, it is... overwhelming!
I cannot endure it for much longer...
Ah... Ah!!
Perhaps... Ah!
I cannot... explain... my words are... fleeting...
Please... please...
Pleasepleasepleaseplease...
Please... be giving it to me...
Yes... Yes! I'm... I'm coming!! Ahh!
Flame Spirit... Yes... Yes!! Ahh!
Hah... hah... Goodness. I have enjoyed myself!
Hah... hah... I am... full of happiness.
Ah... hah... I was needing a release like that.
Ah... ahh... I still feel it...
Please do not be thinking of myself -- or of Brigid -- as lesser because of what you witnessed...
I would hate for you think poorly of Brigid because of my actions. Forgive me for being so... indulgent.
Forgive me for having a lack of patience. However, I must ask how much longer things will take. After all, I am already... finished? Finished.
I have not seen anyone else from Brigid here. I wonder why I am the only one to have visited?
This has felt like a good amount of exercise. I shall be resting now...
The only thing that is causing me more tiredness is a day spent riding on a wyvern's back. Doing that is requiring a lot of physical endurance... or else you may get thrown off.
Do you see the strengths of Brigid now?
Is it possible that I could be bringing more clothes with me? While that would help me get the victory, it would be rather rude to be over-dressed.
This feels like the wrong time to be making the small talk...
I hope my braiding has not been undone. It takes a very large amount of my morning to get right.
This beach is reminding me of the coast of Brigid! I would enjoy going for a swim later.
I remember being taken to see the coasts of Brigid when I was young. I learned to swim rather quickly.
This city is like nothing I have seen before. Not even in the Empire. It still amazes me that you were bringing me here, ~player~!
Brigid does not have cities that are this large. We have... collections of small towns that gather for events. We would never have buildings this tall, unless they were built within the trees.
My grandfather has told me to think of Brigid not as what it currently is, but as what it will become. I wonder... one day, will Brigid look anything like Paris?
This game has contained more fun than I have experienced in a long time. Did you also have fun?

"Hoes are feeling the mad.
Hoes are feeling the mad."
I have gratitude. I think I have learned a lot to~background.time~! This was a fun experience.
That was a lot of build up... and I feel like I did not get my own satisfaction. Let us do this again sometime.
This was not how I expected things to go. I anticipated having to remove more than just my boots...
Exotic feather.
This game has contained more fun than I have experienced in a long time. Did you also have fun?
Hilda! Please do not be taking the blanket from Bernie. I will be acting as a shield if you are trying to take it!
Please, you two... do not be arguing about Uno again.
That song you are singing is very lovely, Lux. You are reminding me of a friend, Dorothea. She has been singing in an opera company!
That song you are singing is very lovely, Lux.
That tune that you are humming is very lovely, Lux.
